Title: Relates to insurance reserve funds of certain school districts
Summary: Allows the Grand Island central school district, the Tonawanda central school district, the Kenmore Tonawanda union free school district, the Frontier central school district, and the Orchard Park central school district to establish insurance reserve funds.
LawCode: Amd ยง6-n, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to insurance reserve funds of certain school districts
